title: Get​
content: </> Stellar.Get( name: string, dontInit: boolean? ) → any Retrieves a singular file loaded with Stellar by its name

title: BulkGet​
content: </> Stellar.BulkGet(...: string) → {ModuleScript } Retrieves multiple loaded with Stellar by its name. Useful for starting services when the client/server first runs

title: Load​
content: </> Stellar.Load(module: ModuleScript ) → () Loads a singular file into Stellar

title: Library​
content: </> Stellar.Library(name: string) → () Retrieves a wally package by name.

title: MarkAsLoaded​
content: deprecated in v2 </> This was deprecated in v2 Function will not error so existing code still works. Please implement your own solution. Stellar.MarkAsLoaded() → ()

title: OnLoadingCompletion​
content: deprecated in v2 </> This was deprecated in v2 Function will be called so existing code still works. Please implement your own solution. Stellar.OnLoadingCompletion(func: () → ()) → ()
